text: Amando Samo (August 16, 1948 â€“ August 7, 2021) was a Micronesian Roman Catholic bishop. He became a priest in 1977. He became a titular bishop of Liberta and auxiliary bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Caroline Islands. From 1994 to 1995, he was coadjutor bishop of the diocese. From 1995 to 2020, Samo was bishop of the diocese. Samo died on August 7, 2021 at the age of 72.Diocese of Caroline Island ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Roman Catholic bishops
title: Amando Samo
